entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor Publish is taking a very long time #12948
  • [Not Planned] Work required to better enable adding platforms to MAUI #12947
    Backlog
  • Android Net8.0 Publish failing with error XAGJS7023: System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #12945
  • MAUI_splashscreen: How to set Splash screen for Light and Dark mode for iOS and Android #12944
  • Performance degradation when navigating to a page and going back several times #12930
    Backlog
  • Add support for Background image with ImageBrush #12928
    Backlog
  • Random images shown in Image class on Android #12923
    Backlog
  • CollectionView: ScrollTo item when setting SelectedItem #12920
    Backlog
  • "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.ShellFlyoutItemView" is reported to screen readers instead of the shown text - poor accessibility #12919
  • Add a splash screen to a .NET MAUI app project on per-platform approaches #12917
  • [Maps] [Regression from Xamarin.Forms.Maps] Changing Location on a Pin does nothing #12916
    Backlog
  • [Regression from Xamarin Forms] CarouselView does not update view when current item changes programmatically #12915
    Backlog
  • MAUI should expose x:Name as AutomationId to accessibility tools (like VS accessibility checker) #12913

Closed

  • Titlebar Translucent Issue When Switching the Root to Shell #10573
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • MAUI need Canvas layout like WPF or UWP #12862
  • Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib #12826
  • [Windows] ContentPage BackgroundColor Transparent not working #12926
    Backlog
  • $SolutionDir incorrectly maps to $ProjectDir when deploying to iOS (simulator) #7534
  • Problem encountered on MAUI first app tutorial device Emulator setup. #12763
  • MAUI app build on long path not working #12777
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10386
    Backlog
  • Lowercase char in Entry with TextTransform=Uppercase moves cursor to the beginning #11313
    Backlog
  • HTML5 video not working on MAUI WebView #4807
    Backlog
  • Picker and Switch BackgroundColor properties are not updated from ViewModel #12749
    Backlog
  • Maui Android Crash: Canvas: trying to draw too large(106099200bytes) bitmap. #12641
  • ImageSource.FromResource random image... #12701
  • On Android only, buttons inside grid stays invisible after grid visibility changes to true #8574
  • [Android 13] - MediaPicker - Permissions issue #11211
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI does not work with Android 13 Android.permission.write_external_storage #11275
    Backlog
  • Windows Application Package build error Microsoft.DesktopBridge.targets(744,5): error : Specified EntryPointExe '' was not found in the project outputs. #12729

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more BlazorWebView device tests #12946
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [net7.0] Fix password placeholder font issue on Android #12943
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #12941
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Ensure iOS always has the required splash storyboard #12939
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Use relative X position of tap when determining if the button was hit #12936
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12935
    area/single project ☝️
  • [net7.0] Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12934
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net7.0] Flag valid measure status in iOS backing views to avoid repeat measuring #12933
  • [net7.0] Add PublicAPI to the Graphics projects #12931
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221209.1 to 1.2.230118.102 #12921
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12888
    area/toolbar
  • [housekeeping] Format main #12929
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix crash disconnecting CollectionView #12940
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10413
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview
  • [net7.0] Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12914
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix issues invalidating the Background of some controls #12773
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.10 to 1.0.0.11 #12843
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.8 to 1.2.1.9 #12848
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update Essentials Text-To-Speech API Docs #12851
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Updated

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12844
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Copy MAUI to bin when SelfContained=False #8285
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, .NET 8 Planning
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove FontImageExtension #5012
    area/Xaml </>, area/fonts 🅰️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Pre-compute Grid star values when possible #12912
    area/layout 🔲
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2 #12686
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12840
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12905
    area/templates 📄
  • [Tizen] refactor splash updater #12897
    community ✨, partner/tizen
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.15 to 1.0.0.16 #12838
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.10 to 1.1.0.11 #12837
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1.1 to 1.6.0.1 #12841
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • Update Essentials SMS API Docs #12849
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
